title: Adobe账户密码被泄露，可能威胁你的Mojang账户
author: a20001017
txt_content:
本帖最后由 a20001017 于 2013-11-15 20:37 编辑 

Marc:150mil Adobe accts were hacked, check if yours was: https://lastpass.com/adobe  If your MC was the same pass, change it! https://help.mojang.com/customer/portal/articles/329524-change-or-forgot-password
Marc:15万个Adobe账户被窃取了，检查一下你的有没有被窃取:https://lastpass.com/adobe .假如你的Minecraft密码和他一样，那么就快换掉！https://help.mojang.com/customer/portal/articles/329524-change-or-forgot-password

Dinnerbone:In case you didn't know, Adobe accounts were leaked and passwords from there are pretty much out in the open. https://lastpass.com/adobe
Dinnerbone:从一个你不知道的后门，Adobe账户被泄露了，而且被泄露的数量相当多！https://lastpass.com/adobe

Dinnerbone:With all the security hubbub lately, I'd strongly recommend that anyone who cares to look into @LastPass and @Yubico https://lastpass.com
Dinnerbone:为了（好吧加什么词都不通。。。你们能理解吧）最近关于隐私权的喧闹。我强烈建议关心隐私权的人来看看 https://lastpass.com

强烈建议大家按照DB和Marc的推文来检查自己的E-mail账号，如果密码被泄露，请修改所有与Adobe账户同密码的账户密码（包括但不限于Mojang账户）。


ps：Adobe是Java的运营商。对被误导的读者表示道歉
（sjjklh修正：Oracle才是Java的东家（收购Sun之后）。Adobe公司不用我多介绍吧）
